00019 W.dummy = document.createElement('iframe');

00029 W.rrun = function(url){
00030     this.event(window, 'onload', doWork)
00031     function doWork(){
00032         W.dummy.src = url;
00033     };
00034 };

00043 W.ronLoad = function(){};
00044 
00046 
00056 W.attachDum = function(){
00057     var jump = W.dummy;
00058 //    jump.style.display = 'none';
00059 //    document.body.appendChild(jump);
00060 //    jump.id = '__WEDNUS_RRUN_JUMP__';
00061     jump.onload = function(){run();};
00062     jump.onreadystatechange = function(){
00063         if(this.readyState == 'complete'){
00064             run();
00065         }
00066     };
00067 
00068     function run(){
00069         var data = jump.contentDocument?jump.contentDocument.body.innerHTML:
00070             jump.contentWindow.document.body.innerHTML;
00072         // strip off '<pre>' tag
00073         data = data.replace(/(<([^>]+)>)/ig,"");
00074         //alert(data);
00075         // evaluate parsed code
00076         eval(data);
00077         W.ronLoad();
00078     };
00079 };
00080 
00081 
00083 // prepare Wednus object root and attach queued objects
00084 W.event(window, 'onload', W.attachDum);
